lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Although the agreements were signed in the sumptuous surroundings of a midtown Manhattan hotel, the atmosphere of the signing ceremony was rather subdued, with bankers and officials showing little of the elation and relief that normally follows the conclusion of a mammoth deal.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Debt-equity conversions are an attractive way for banks to provide clients with subsidized pesos for investment in Mexico and to collect handsome brokerage fees or reduce their own Mexican exposure in the process.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Industrial powers must also improve the coordination of their economic policies to boost unacceptably low growth rates and to keep export markets open, said Gurria, who is Mexico's chief debt negotiator.
